text:
Kevin Zinger is an American movie producer and media entrepreneur based in San Diego, California. Zinger is best known for producing an award-winning documentary movie "Saving Banksy".
Career.
Zinger started his career by producing and promoting shows all over San Diego County by the age of 19. Zinger co-founded "Supporting Radical Habits" productions which helped pave the way for bands like Sublime, Offspring, Pennywise. In 1997, Zinger co-founded [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suburban_Noize_Records Suburban Noize Records], an independent record label based in Burbank, California.
In 2017, Zinger produced a highly acclaimed documentary movie "Saving Banksy". The film critics aggregator Rotten Tomatoes gave the movie an approval rating of 100% based on 13 reviews and an average rating of 6.2/10.
